Deprecated List

Member Ogre::RenderSystem::createRenderTexture (const String &name, unsigned int width, unsigned int height, TextureType texType=TEX_TYPE_2D, PixelFormat internalFormat=PF_X8R8G8B8, const NameValuePairList *miscParams=0)
This method is deprecated, and exists only for backward compatibility. You can create arbitrary rendertextures with the TextureManager::createManual call with usage TU_RENDERTARGET.
